metadata.author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
metadata.comments: Solution template for Azure DDoS Protection

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: Azure DDoS Protection Workbook with template

metadata.description: This workbook visualizes security-relevant Azure DDoS events across several filterable panels. Offering a summary tab, metrics and a investigate tabs across multiple workspaces.

| project id","crossComponentResources":["value::selected"],"value":["value::all"],"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":["value::all"],"selectAllValue":"","showDefault":false},"timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","label":"Public IP Addresses"}],"style":"pills","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"DDoS Summary","comparison":"isEqualTo"},"name":"parameters - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "DDoSProtectionNotifications" or Category == "DDoSMitigationReports"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| extend TrafficOverview = coalesce(parse_json(column_ifexists("TrafficOverview_s","")),parse_json(AdditionalFields["TrafficOverview"]))
| extend TrafficOverview = parse_json(tostring(TrafficOverview))
| extend TotalTCPPackets = todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_TCP_packets)
| extend TotalTCPPacketsDropped =  todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_TCP_packets_dropped)
| extend TotalUDPPackets =  todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_UDP_packets)
| extend TotalUDPPacketsDropped =  todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_UDP_packets_dropped)
| extend TotalOtherPackets =  todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_other_packets)
| extend TotalOtherPacketsDropped =  todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_other_packets_dropped)
| extend TotalPackets =  todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_packets)
| extend TotalPacketsDropped =  todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_packets_dropped)
| summarize sum(TotalPacketsDropped), sum(TotalPackets), sum(TotalUDPPackets),sum(TotalUDPPacketsDropped),sum(TotalOtherPackets),sum(TotalOtherPacketsDropped),sum(TotalTCPPackets),sum(TotalTCPPacketsDropped)
| extend TotalPackets = sum_TotalPackets , TotalPacketsDropped = sum_TotalPacketsDropped, TotalUDPPackets = sum_TotalUDPPackets, TotalUDPPacketsDropped = sum_TotalUDPPacketsDropped, TotalOtherPackets = sum_TotalOtherPackets, TotalOtherPacketsDropped = sum_TotalOtherPacketsDropped, TotalTCPPackets = sum_TotalTCPPackets, TotalTCPPacketsDropped = sum_TotalTCPPacketsDropped
| project TotalPackets, TotalPacketsDropped, TotalTCPPackets, TotalTCPPacketsDropped, TotalUDPPackets, TotalUDPPacketsDropped, TotalOtherPackets, TotalOtherPacketsDropped 
| evaluate narrow()
| extend TableName = Column
| extend Count = Value
| project TableName, Count","size":4,"title":"Traffic Overview","noDataMessage":"You do not have DDOS enabled","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspaces}"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"Count","sortOrder":1}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"Count","sortOrder":1}],"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"Count","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":false}}},"subtitleContent":{"columnMatch":"TableName"},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}},"customWidth":"100","name":"Traffic Overview"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureDiagnostics
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where Category == "DDoSMitigationReports"
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| extend TopAttackVector = coalesce(tostring(parse_json(column_ifexists("AttackVectors_s",""))[0]), AdditionalFields["AttackVectors"])
| extend TrafficOverview = coalesce(parse_json(column_ifexists("TrafficOverview_s","")),parse_json(AdditionalFields["TrafficOverview"]))
| extend TrafficOverview = parse_json(tostring(TrafficOverview))
| extend TotalPackets = todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_packets)
| extend Total_packets_dropped_ = todouble(TrafficOverview.Total_packets_dropped)
| where TotalPackets > 0
| where TopAttackVector <> ""
| take 10
| project TimeGenerated , TopAttackVector , TotalPackets, TotalPacketsDropped = Total_packets_dropped_ , ResourceId , IPAddress, Resource

25 - Copy - Copy - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureDiagnostics
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where Category == "DDoSMitigationReports"
| extend Protocols_s = coalesce(parse_json(column_ifexists("Protocols_s","")),parse_json(AdditionalFields["Protocols"]))
| extend Protocols_s = parse_json(tostring(Protocols_s))
| where Protocols_s <> "{}" 
| extend DynamicProtocols = todynamic(Protocols_s)
| project DynamicProtocols
| as T
| mv-apply DynamicProtocols on (extend Protocol = tostring(bag_keys(DynamicProtocols)[0])
| project Protocol, value = todouble(DynamicProtocols[Protocol])  )
| summarize Percentage = strcat(round(100 * sum(value) / toscalar(T | count), 3)) by Protocol
| extend PercDec = todouble(Percentage)
| render piechart

properties.description: @{workbookKey=AzureDDoSStandardProtection; logoFileName=AzDDoS.svg; description=This workbook visualizes security-relevant Azure DDoS events across several filterable panels. Offering a summary tab, metrics and a investigate tabs across multiple workspaces.; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.2; title=Azure DDoS Protection Workbook; templateRelativePath=AzDDoSStandardWorkbook.json; subtitle=; provider=Microsoft}.description
Azure DDoS Protection data connector with template
Azure DDoS Protection data connector with template version 2.0.4

connectorUiConfig.title: Azure DDoS Protection
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Connect to Azure DDoS Protection Standard logs via Public IP Address Diagnostic Logs. In addition to the core DDoS protection in the platform, Azure DDoS Protection Standard provides advanced DDoS mitigation capabilities against network attacks. It's automatically tuned to protect your specific Azure resources. Protection is simple to enable during the creation of new virtual networks. It can also be done after creation and requires no application or resource changes. For more information, see the [Microsoft Sentinel documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2219760&wt.mc_id=sentinel_dataconnectordocs_content_cnl_csasci).

value:
AzureDiagnostics | where ResourceType == "PUBLICIPADDRESSES"
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

dataTypes.name: AzureDiagnostics (Public IP Addresses)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
AzureDiagnostics | where ResourceType == "PUBLICIPADDRESSES"
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

connectorUiConfig.title: Azure DDoS Protection
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Connect to Azure DDoS Protection Standard logs via Public IP Address Diagnostic Logs. In addition to the core DDoS protection in the platform, Azure DDoS Protection Standard provides advanced DDoS mitigation capabilities against network attacks. It's automatically tuned to protect your specific Azure resources. Protection is simple to enable during the creation of new virtual networks. It can also be done after creation and requires no application or resource changes. For more information, see the [Microsoft Sentinel documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2219760&wt.mc_id=sentinel_dataconnectordocs_content_cnl_csasci).

dataTypes.name: AzureDiagnostics (Public IP Addresses)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
AzureDiagnostics | where ResourceType == "PUBLICIPADDRESSES"
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
AzureDiagnostics | where ResourceType == "PUBLICIPADDRESSES"
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

properties.description: Azure DDoS Protection Analytics Rule 1 with template
properties.displayName: Azure DDoS Protection Analytics Rule template

properties.description: Identifies IP addresses that generate over 5% of traffic during DDoS attack mitigation
properties.displayName: DDoS Attack IP Addresses - Percent Threshold
properties.query:
let T1 = AzureDiagnostics
  | where ResourceType == "PUBLICIPADDRESSES" and Category == "DDoSMitigationFlowLogs"
  | summarize rows_count = count() by destPublicIpAddress_s, sourcePublicIpAddress_s;
let T2 = AzureDiagnostics
  | where ResourceType == "PUBLICIPADDRESSES" and Category == "DDoSMitigationFlowLogs"
  | summarize rows_total = count() by destPublicIpAddress_s;
T2
  | join kind=leftouter T1 on destPublicIpAddress_s
  | project destPublicIpAddress_s, sourcePublicIpAddress_s, percent_of_traffic = 100*rows_count/rows_total
  | order by percent_of_traffic desc
  | where percent_of_traffic > 5

properties.description: Azure DDoS Protection Analytics Rule 2 with template
properties.displayName: Azure DDoS Protection Analytics Rule template

properties.description: AttackSourcesPPSThreshold_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.4
Identifies IP addresses that generates maximal traffic rate over 10k PPS during DDoS attack mitigation
properties.displayName: DDoS Attack IP Addresses - PPS Threshold
properties.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where ResourceType == 'PUBLICIPADDRESSES' and Category == "DDoSMitigationFlowLogs"
//sample rate of mitigation device 1:1000 so the PPS of the source is estimated to be x1000.
| summarize PPS = 1000 * count() by destPublicIpAddress_s, sec = bin(TimeGenerated, 1s), sourcePublicIpAddress_s
| summarize maxPPS = max(PPS) by destPublicIpAddress_s, sourcePublicIpAddress_s
| order by destPublicIpAddress_s, maxPPS desc
| where maxPPS > 10000
